title: Sweet Potato Pie
description: Shared from a Southern recipe, this homemade sweet potato pie is easy to make with boiled sweet potato.
instructions: Place whole sweet potato in pot and cover with water; bring to a boil. Boil until tender when pierced with a fork, 40 to 50 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Remove sweet potato from the pot and run under cold water. Discard the skin.
Mash flesh in a bowl. Add butter and mix until smooth. Add sugar, milk, eggs, nutmeg, cinnamon, and vanilla; blend until smooth.
Pour into unbaked pie crust and bake 55 to 60 minutes.
